verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> is my shepherd <WH7462>; I shall not want <WH2637>.
He makes me to lie down <WH7257> in green <WH1877> pastures <WH4999>: he leads <WH5095> me beside the still <WH4496> waters <WH4325>.
He restores <WH7725> my soul <WH5315>: he leads <WH5148> me in the paths <WH4570> of righteousness <WH6664> for his name <WH8034>'s sake.

Yes <WH3212>, though I walk through the valley <WH1516> of the shadow of death <WH6757>, I will fear <WH3372> no evil <WH7451>: for you are with me <WH7626>; your rod and your staff <WH4938> they comfort me <WH5162>.
You prepare <WH6186> a table <WH7979> before <WH6440> me in the presence of my enemies <WH6887>: you anoint <WH1878> my head <WH7218> with oil <WH8081>; my cup <WH3563> runs over <WH7310>.
Surely goodness <WH2896> and mercy <WH2617> shall follow <WH7291> me all the days <WH3117> of my life <WH2416>: and I will live <WH3427> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> for ever <WH753>.
